message.name: ERR_CONCERN_ROLE_COMM_RV_CANCELED_ALREADY
message.locale: The communication has been canceled already.
The communication has been cancelled already.

message.name: ERR_CONCERN_ROLE_COMM_RV_NOT_DRAFT
message.locale: Only communications with a status of draft can be canceled.
Only communications with a status of draft can be cancelled.

message.name: INF_NO_ADDRESS_AVAILABLE
message.locale: No address available.

message.name: INF_NO_EMAIL_AVAILABLE
message.locale: Email Address Unavailable

message.name: INF_NO_PHONENUMBER_AVAILABLE
message.locale: Phone Number Unavailable

message.name: ERR_CONCERN_ROLE_COMM_RV_CANCELED_CANT_SEND
message.locale: The communication has been canceled so it cannot be marked as sent.
The communication has been cancelled so it cannot be marked as sent.

message.name: ERR_CONCERN_ROLE_COMM_RV_ALREADY_SENT
message.locale: The communication already has a status of sent.

message.name: ERR_COMM_DATE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: The date for this communication must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_COMM_DATE_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must supply a from date for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_EMAIL_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: %1s has no email address and cannot receive email communications. You must supply an email address.

message.name: ERR_COMM_NAME_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must supply a correspondent name for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_PHONE_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must provide the phone number for this correspondent.

message.name: ERR_COMM_PROFORMA_TYPE_BLANK
message.locale: You must select a pro forma type for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_SUBJECT_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must supply a subject for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_TEXT_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must supply freeform text for this communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_FAX_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must provide the fax number for this correspondent.

message.name: ERR_COMM_NO_SENDER_EMAIL
message.locale: In order to send an email communication, the sender must have a valid email address. Currently neither the logged in user nor the organization have a valid email address. Please contact your administrator.

In order to send an email communication, the sender must have a valid email address. Currently neither the logged in user nor the organisation have a valid email address. Please contact your administrator.

message.name: ERR_COMM_INCORRECT_CORRESPONDENT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must supply one correspondent.

message.name: ERR_COMM_METHOD_PHONE_NEED_TYPECODE_BLANK
message.locale: No communication type exists for method type phone. Please reset the communication type to blank.

message.name: ERR_COMM_TYPE_CODE_BLANK
message.locale: You must select a communication type for this method of communication.

message.name: ERR_COMM_CORRESPONDENT__BLANK
message.locale: You must select a correspondent.

message.name: ERR_COMM_CORRESPONDENT__MULTIPLE
message.locale: You must select only one correspondent.

message.name: ERR_COMM_CORRESPONDENT__IS_CLIENT
message.locale: If the correspondent is the client then the correspondent type must be Client.

message.name: ERR_COMM_CORRESPONDENT__NOT_CLIENT
message.locale: If the correspondent is not the client the correspondent type must not be of type Client.

message.name: ERR_COMM_CORRESPONDENT__IS_PRIMARY_CLIENT
message.locale: If the correspondent is the primary client then the correspondent type must be Client.

message.name: ERR_COMM_CORRESPONDENT__NOT_PRIMARY_CLIENT
message.locale: If the correspondent is not the primary client the correspondent type must not be of type Client.

message.name: ERR_COMM_ADDRESS_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: %1s has no address and cannot receive communications. You must supply an address.

message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_NO_MODIFY_RECORD_SENT
message.locale: A communication date must be provided if the status is changed to Sent.

message.name: ERR_RECORD_COMM_EMAIL_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: You must provide the email address for this communication.

message.name: ERR_CASE_STATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: A communication cannot be created for a new case participant on a closed case. Please select an existing case participant or re-open the case.

message.name: ERR_COMM_CORRESPONDENT__IS_DECEASED
message.locale: A new communication cannot be created as the correspondent is deceased.

message.name: ERR_COMM_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New communication details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_COMM_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Communication details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_COMM_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Communication details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_COMM_CORRESPONDENT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be selected as a correspondent.

message.name: ERR_COMM_XRV_PROSPECT_PERSON_LASTNAME_NOT_AVL
message.locale: Last Name is not available for the Prospect Person. Please enter the Last Name from the Prospect Person home page.

message.name: ERR_COMM_XFV_MULTIPLE_ADDRESS
message.locale: An address must be selected or a new address entered but not both.

message.name: ERR_COMM_XFV_MULTIPLE_EMAILADDRESS
message.locale: An email address must be selected or a new email address entered but not both.

message.name: ERR_COMM_XFV_MULTIPLE_PHONENUMBER
message.locale: A fax/phone number must be selected or a new fax/phone number entered but not both.

message.name: ERR_COMM_XRV_CASE_NEVER_CLOSED
message.locale: This communication cannot be previewed/printed as this case has never been closed.

message.name: ERR_COMM_XRV_CASE_NOT_CLOSED
message.locale: This communication cannot be previewed/printed as this case is not closed.

message.name: ERR_COMM_XRV_CASE_NOT_SUSPENDED
message.locale: This communication cannot be previewed/printed as this case is not suspended.

message.name: ERR_COMM_XRV_CASE_NOT_UNSUSPENDED
message.locale: This communication cannot be previewed/printed as this case has not been unsuspended.

message.name: INF_GENERATECOMMUNICATIONS_SUB
message.locale: Report from GenerateCommunications batch job run on %1s as %2s.

message.name: INF_GENERATE_COMMUNICATIONS_LOG_FILE_NAME
message.locale: GenerateCommunicationsBatchLog

message.name: INF_COMM_PROSPECT_PERSON_LASTNAME_ADDRESS_NOT_AVL
message.locale: Case closure notification was not generated while closing the case as %1s unavailable for the prospect person.

message.name: INF_COMM_ALL_CASEMEMBERS
message.locale: All

message.name: ERR_COMM_TYPE_EXCEPTION
message.locale: The following communication exceptions exist for the correspondent %1s: %2s.
